event_data.play: Auditoría de Seguridad y Actualizaciones del Sistema
event_data.task: Verificar si hay servicios que requieren reinicio

res.stdout:
No core libraries or services have been updated since boot-up.
Reboot should not be necessary.
res.cmd:
if [ -f /usr/bin/needs-restarting ]; then
  needs-restarting -r
else
  echo "El comando needs-restarting no está disponible"
fi

module_args._raw_params:
if [ -f /usr/bin/needs-restarting ]; then
  needs-restarting -r
else
  echo "El comando needs-restarting no está disponible"
fi

stdout_lines: No core libraries or services have been updated since boot-up.
